error.noLabelTooltip: Monarch | Error: Please provide a 'tooltip' or 'label' for control '{class}'.

label.magnify: Show card image. Hold shift to show players.

enableSheets.name: Enable  Monarch Sheets
enableSheets.hint: Enable Monarch as the default card sheet.
enableSheets.notification: Set  Monarch as the default for {sheet} sheets.

world.name: World Settings
world.hint: Theses settings apply to all players.

client.name: Client Settings
client.hint: Theses settings apply only to you. Each player may configure these on thier own.

handReset.name: Reset On Hand
handReset.hint: Whether or not to show a reset button on the hand to send all cards back to their deck.

showCard.name: Show Card To Players
showCard.hint: Whether or not to include a 'Show card to players' button on cards.

cardHeight.name: Card height
cardHeight.hint: How tall in pixels cards in the hand/deck/pile should be displayed.

discardPile.name: Discard pile
discardPile.hint: The Cards pile used for discarding cards. Leave blank to disable.

badges.name: Show Core Badges
badges.hint: Whether or not to display badges for the core card properties.

transparent.name: Transparent Applications
transparent.hint: Enable or disable transparency for each application type.

fade.name: Fade Applications
fade.hint: Enable or disable fading for each application type.
